lines.text: How much kinkier can you get than turning into a werewolf once a month?
This is where I shall prepare our gourmet feasts.
You mean where you unwrap them and stick them in the microwave?
A good chef never reveals his secrets.
It's okay. I'm used to the callous attitude mortals have towards vampires. I'm used to wandering the earth - reviled, hunted, hated. That's why I became a lawyer.
